data.text: SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE THE
JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES,
WASHINGTON, D.C.
DEPOSITION OF:
ROGER STONE
Friday, December 17, 2021
Washington, D.C.
The interview in the above matter was held in room 5480, O'Neill House Office
Building, commencing at 10:00 a.m.
Present:
Representatives Luria, Schiff, Aguilar, Raskin, and Cheney.
Appearances:
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE
THE JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL:
, CHIEF INVESTIGATIVE COUNSEL

GRANT J. SMITH, ESQ.
STRATEGYSMITH
Bank of America City Centre
401 East Las Olas Blvd., Suite 130-120
Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301
We are here this morning for the deposition of Mr. Roger Stone,
conducted by the House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the
United States Capitol, pursuant to House Resolution 503.
This will be a staff-led deposition, though members may choose to ask questions.
I will note for the record we are joined by the vice chair, Ms. Cheney, though we may be
joined by other members during the deposition, and I will endeavor to recognize them
when they appear.
My name i s _ , and I'm the investigative counsel who has been
designated to conduct this deposition by the select committee.

thing goes with counsel for other government agencies.

transcribing the conversation.
The deposition is also being videotaped, but the

question.

We'd be happy to accommodate that.

implicate your Fifth Amendment privilege.
